newsitem.title: USA: American Real Estate offers rights.
newsitem.headline: American Real Estate offers rights.

text.p: American Real Estate Partners LP said Thursday said it is offering holders of its depositary units of record August 8 one right for each five unts held.

The partnership said each right will entitle the holder to purchase four depositary units and one five percent cumulative pay-in-kind redeemable preferred unit, each representing limited partner interests, for $52 until 1700 EDT/2100 GMT September 11.
It said the price is allocable $42 in the aggregate to the four depositary units and $10 to the preferred unit.
The company said the registration it filed last month has been declared effective by the Securities and Exchange Commission.

It said exercising rights holders also will be entitled to subscribe under an over-subscription privilege for all or any portion of the depositary units and preferred units not subscribed for by other rights holders.
American Real Estate Partners said it anticipates certificates evidencing the rights to subscribe, together with a prospectus, will be mailed to unitholders by August 13.
